- Find chocolate bar in fridge - Make tea. Anticipate lovely elevenses - Carry tea and other things to desk, placing chocolate bar in pocket - Enjoy tea - Discover melted chocolate 2 hours later - Scream into the abyss and reflect on my failings as a human being. https://t.co/iDlamjAgYr
